name: Robot Eric's Race To Riches
description:
Robot Eric's Race To Riches

Meet Eric, the ambitious robot adventurer from New Japan 7.

Eric has decided he is fed up with his job as a bricklayer and is going to take to the skies in search of riches.

Help Eric collect ancient artefacts from across the galaxy:

  • Find the artefacts before your energy runs out
  • Sell the loot for sweet, sweet credits $$$
  • The further you travel from your ship, the more valuable the loot!
  • Never lay a single brick again

Future developments:

  • Upgrade Eric's components for even more looting (planned)
  • More level variety and maze-like maps
Controls:
  • WASD/Arrow keys for movement
  • Press SPACE when next to the truck to generate a new level
  • Press SPACE when holding an item to drop it. You can only carry one item at a time! 
  • You can find and place bombs to clear a path through walls
Credits

The game was designed and built by Level Two Beards, Merchant Prince Digital and CryoniX, for the Kalorian Game Jame. It is intended as a prototype/concept only and contains bugs.

All in game 3D models are original work by our team during the jam.

With music and sound effects from open source places on the web, bundle purchased and 'Open Game Art' etc.
